ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Any news about Tinkering Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s a terrible fix you re in, having to decide what to do with all that. Tell you what.  Let me help you out.  I ll take all that plat off your hands so
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Jun 30, 2000 at 10:02:12AM +0000, Xillitil of Povar wrote:
>
> gotta love verant...now i gotta decide if i should spend the 12k i got
> saved, and practice now, or wait and see it tinkering gets cheaper when they
> 'fix' it :(
>
That's a terrible fix you're in, having to decide what to do with all that.
Tell you what. Let me help you out. I'll take all that plat off your hands
so that you don't have to worry about it.

No need to thank me. It's the least I can do for a fellow Gnome of Povar.

Pasketti, Povar
